description.author: Trevor L. McDonell
description.description:
Linear systems, matrix decompositions, and other numerical computations for
use in Accelerate. Most operations are implemented efficiently via FFI calls
to BLAS and LAPACK

For further information refer to the main /Accelerate/ package:
<http://hackage.haskell.org/package/accelerate>

package-flags.name: llvm-cpu
package-flags.description: Enable the LLVM backend for multicore CPUs

package-flags.name: llvm-ptx
package-flags.description: Enable the LLVM PTX backend for NVIDIA GPUs
